title: Scientist calls for 'antimalarials for mosquitoes' to fight killer disease
text:
Scientist calls for 'antimalarials for mosquitoes' to fight killer disease 9:32pm IST - 01:54 
A British scientist is proposing a radical shift in the fight against one of the world's deadliest diseases to stop the spread of malaria - antimalarials for mosquitoes. Martyn Herman reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A British scientist is proposing a radical shift in the fight against one of the world's deadliest diseases to stop the spread of malaria - antimalarials for mosquitoes. Martyn Herman reports.
